System Backup: The archive can be uncompressed with %2 on Windows systems.
System Cadangan: Arsip dapat dikompres dengan %2 pada sistem Windows.

System Backup: You need more permissions to activate maintenance mode right now.
System Cadangan: Anda memerlukan lebih banyak izin untuk mengaktifkan mode perawatan sekarang.

System Backup: To create the backup, please deselect "Put store into maintenance mode" or update your permissions.
System Cadangan: Untuk membuat cadangan, batalkan pilihan "Masukkan ke dalam mode perawatan" atau perbarui izin Anda.

System Backup: Something went wrong while putting your store into maintenance mode.
System Cadangan: Ada yang tidak beres saat meletakkan toko Anda ke mode perawatan.

System Backup: You need more free space to create a backup.
System Cadangan: Anda membutuhkan lebih banyak ruang kosong untuk membuat cadangan.

System Backup: You need more permissions to create a backup.
System Cadangan: Anda memerlukan lebih banyak izin untuk membuat cadangan.

System Backup: We can't create the backup right now.
System Cadangan: Kami tidak dapat membuat backup sekarang.

System Backup: We can't delete one or more backups.
System Cadangan: Kami tidak dapat menghapus satu atau lebih backup.

System Backup: To complete the rollback, please deselect "Put store into maintenance mode" or update your permissions.
System Cadangan: Untuk menyelesaikan rollback, batalkan pilihan "Masukkan ke dalam mode perawatan" atau perbarui izin Anda.

System Backup: We can't find the backup file.
System Cadangan: Kami tidak dapat menemukan file cadangan.

System Backup: We can't connect to the FTP right now.
System Cadangan: Kami tidak dapat terhubung ke FTP sekarang.

System Backup: You need more permissions to perform a rollback.
System Cadangan: Anda memerlukan lebih banyak izin untuk melakukan rollback.

System Backup: You created the system backup (excluding media).
System Cadangan: Anda membuat backup sistem (tidak termasuk media).

System Backup: You created the database and media backup.
System Cadangan: Anda membuat database dan backup media.

System Backup: Please correct the order of creation for a new backup.
System Cadangan: Silakan perbaiki urutan dari pembuatan cadangan baru.

System Backup: The backup file does not exist.
The backup file path was not specified.
The backup file "%1" does not exist.
Sorry, but we cannot read from or write to backup file "%1".
System Cadangan: Maaf, tapi kami tidak dapat membaca dari atau menulis ke file cadangan "%1".

System Backup: The backup file handler was unspecified.
Something went wrong while writing to the backup file "%1".
System Cadangan: Ada yang tidak beres saat menulis ke file cadangan "%1".

System Backup: We can't save the Cron expression.
System Cadangan: Kita tidak bisa menyimpan ekspresi Cron.

System Backup: You will lose any data created since the backup was made, including admin users, customers and orders.
System Cadangan: Anda akan kehilangan data yang dibuat sejak cadangan dibuat, termasuk pengguna admin, pelanggan dan pesanan.

System Backup: Are you sure you want to continue?
This may take a few moments.
System Cadangan: Ini mungkin memakan waktu beberapa saat.

System Backup: Be sure your store is in maintenance mode during backup.
System Cadangan: Pastikan toko Anda dalam mode perawatan saat melakukan backup.

System Backup: Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z), numbers (0-9) or spaces in this field.
System Cadangan: Silakan gunakan hanya huruf (a-z atau A-Z), angka (0-9) atau spasi di bidang ini.

System Backup: Please put your store into maintenance mode during backup.
System Cadangan: Silakan simpan toko Anda ke mode perawatan saat melakukan backup.

System Backup: Please enter the password to confirm rollback.
System Cadangan: Silakan masukkan kata sandi untuk mengkonfirmasi putar kembali.

System Backup: Please put your store into maintenance mode during rollback processing.
System Cadangan: Silakan simpan toko Anda ke mode perawatan selama proses rollback.

System Backup: Are you sure you want to delete the selected backup(s)?
System Cadangan: Yakin ingin menghapus, cadangan yang dipilih?
